amendment.description: To prohibit reverse targeting and protect the rights of Americans who are communicating with people abroad.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3913 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 12.

action.text: Amendment SA 3913 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S640-641; text: CR S640) To prohibit reverse targeting and protect the rights of Americans who are communicating with people abroad.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3913 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 12.
